body: Thank you again for tuning into our weekly show! next week we will have in pasta paster from our dear friends at the catholic church and we will be discussing the sins of Jesus and not only why you should also be sinning but some of the best ways TO sin now I know some of you young folk think you know it all already but trust me oh haha we old folk have far more experience than you and pasta paster has far more experience than even ME so you'll be wanting to tune in for that. Thank you again for coming have a good night ladies and gentlemen.
